description:
The End
Socks
Today Mom and her mom friends are having Snack Moms. Tonight`s topic is "why does only one of the pair of the males` socks disappear?" Every household has its own sad stories.
Colorful
Recently, Fumi has started to help out at home. White and Black Fumi have appeared to talk about her, and when they started to argue, that is when the colorful Fumi appears!
Forever Mom
Mom is always busy with housework. Bunji and Fumi play with their friends, cry, laugh and so on.  Dad is always cheerful, Grandma is always annoying. What doesn`t change on a daily basis is..
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: くつ下 / カラフル / ずっと, かあさん
